00041         def adrl(self, file):
00042                 if self.builddir:
00043                         dir=self.env.join(self.builddir,file).lstrip('/')
00044                 else:
00045                         dir=file.lstrip('/')
00046                 return dir

00052         def startElement(self, name, attrs): 
00053 
00054                 if name == 'icondirent':
00055                         dir = attrs.get('dir', '')
00056                         sbdir = attrs.get('subdir', '')
00057                         if dir:
00058                                 #if self.env.has_key("DUMPCONFIG"):
00059                                 #       print "env.KDEicon('"+dir+")'"
00060                                 self.env.KDEicon('*', self.adrl(dir), subdir=sbdir)
00061                 elif name == 'subdirent':
00062                         dir = attrs.get('dir', None)
00063                         if dir:
00064                                 #if self.env.has_key("DUMPCONFIG"):
00065                                 #       print "env.SConscript('"+dir+"/SConscript')"
00066                                 self.env.SConscript(self.env.join(self.adrl(dir),"SConscript"))
00067                 elif name == 'docdir':
00068                         self.appname = self.adrl( attrs.get('name', None) )
00069                 elif name == 'docdirent':
00070                         dir = attrs.get('dir', None)
00071                         lang = attrs.get('lang', None)
00072                         if dir and lang:
00073                                 #if self.env.has_key("DUMPCONFIG"):
00074                                 #       print "env.docfolder('"+dir+"', '"+lang+"', '"+self.appname+"')"
00075                                 self.env.docfolder(self.adrl(dir), lang, self.appname)
00076                 elif name == 'podir':
00077                         dir = attrs.get('dir', None)
00078                         appname = attrs.get('name', None)
00079                         if dir and appname:
00080                                 if self.env.has_key('_BUILDDIR_'): dir=self.env.join(self.env['_BUILDDIR_'], dir)
00081                                 self.env.KDElang(dir, appname)
00082                 elif name == 'install':
00083                         self.type   = attrs.get('type', None)
00084                         self.subdir = attrs.get('subdir', None)
00085 
00086                 elif name == 'file':
00087                         name = attrs.get('name', None)
00088                         if self.type:
00089                                 #if self.env.has_key("DUMPCONFIG"):
00090                                 #       print "env.KDEinstall('"+self.type+"', '"+self.subdir+"', '"+name+"')"
00091                                 self.env.KDEinstall(self.type, self.subdir, name)
00092 
00093                 elif name == 'compile':
00094                 
00095                         type = attrs.get('type', None)
00096                         if not type: self.env.Exit(1)
00097                         self.obj = self.env.kobject(type)
00098 
00099                         self.obj.target     = str(attrs.get('target', ''))
00100                         self.obj.source     = []
00101 
00102                         self.obj.includes   = str(attrs.get('includes', ''))
00103                         self.obj.cflags     = str(attrs.get('cflags', ''))
00104                         self.obj.cxxflags   = str(attrs.get('cxxflags', ''))
00105 
00106                         self.obj.libs       = str(attrs.get('libs', ''))
00107                         self.obj.linkflags  = str(attrs.get('linkflags', ''))
00108                         self.obj.libpath    = str(attrs.get('libpath', ''))
00109 
00110                         self.obj.vnum       = str(attrs.get('vnum', ''))
00111                         self.obj.iskdelib   = str(attrs.get('iskdelib', 0))
00112                         self.obj.libprefix  = str(attrs.get('libprefix', ''))
00113 
00114                         self.obj.chdir      = self.adrl(str(attrs.get('chdir', '')))
00115                         self.obj.dirprefix  = self.adrl(str(attrs.get('dirprefix', './')))
00116                         if not self.obj.dirprefix: self.obj.dirprefix='./' # avoid silly errors
00117 
00118                 elif name == 'source':
00119                         file = attrs.get('file', None)
00120                         condition = attrs.get('condition', "");
00121                         lst=condition.split(':')
00122                         for c in lst:
00123                                 if self.env.has_key(c):
00124                                         self.obj.source.append( file )
00125                                         break
00126                         if file and not condition: self.obj.source.append( file )

00128         def endElement(self, name): 
00129                 if name == 'compile':
00130                         self.obj.execute()

00134         def xmlfile(env, file, builddir=''):
00135                 parser = make_parser()
00136                 curHandler = SconsHandler(env, builddir)
00137                 parser.setContentHandler(curHandler)
00138                 parser.parse(open(file))
